item.title: Latest Updates: Pope Francis Dies at 88

item.title: Pope Francis Celebrated Easter and Met With JD Vance the Day Before He Died
item.description: The pontiff met with Vice President JD Vance on Sunday and blessed Catholics gathered for Easter. His doctors had urged him to rest.

item.title: A Timeline of the Life of Pope Francis
item.description: Francis was a deeply religious child in Buenos Aires. The first pontiff from Latin America tried to create a more welcoming church.
